title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
**Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte**

Elevate your everyday look with our revolutionary Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick. This game-changing formula glides on like a cream and sets like a powder, providing a smooth, even finish that lasts all day.

**Highly Pigmented and Long-Lasting**

Our Putty Matte shade is a stunning light taupe-pink hue that's perfect for creating a natural, effortless look. With its highly pigmented formula, you can achieve the perfect shade with just one swipe. Plus, our waterproof and crease-proof technology ensures that your eyeshadow stays in place all day, without fading or smudging.

**Nourishing Ingredients and Skin Benefits**

Not only does our eyeshadow look amazing, but it's also packed with nourishing ingredients that benefit your skin. Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax work together to hydrate, nourish, and protect your skin from environmental damage. Plus, our formula is suitable for delicate, sensitive skin, so you can enjoy beautiful, healthy-looking skin with every application.

**Easy to Apply and Blend**

With our built-in smudger and brush-free application, you can create a flawless look in seconds. Simply coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your eyelid, and blend before the formula sets. The result is a seamless, professional-looking finish that's perfect for everyday wear.

**Choose from a Range of Shades**

Our Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick is available in 30 stunning shades, including Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic finishes. Whether you're looking for a natural everyday look or a bold, evening look, we have the perfect shade for you.

**Get the Look You Want with Julep**

Upgrade your eyeshadow game with our Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick. With its long-lasting, waterproof formula, nourishing ingredients, and easy application, this eyeshadow stick!
